summary: This document is a series of email exchanges from May 27, 2020, containing transcript clips from a deposition or interview of Ghislaine Maxwell. The clips show Maxwell being questioned about her knowledge of underage girls at Jeffrey Epstein's properties, her role in recruiting them, and her awareness of sexual activities and sex toys. The emails are being forwarded to U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the deposition clips, answering questions about her relationship with Jeffrey Epstein, her knowledge of underage girls at his properties, and her own activities.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: Recipient of the email chain containing the deposition clips of Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the questioning; Maxwell is asked about his activities, properties, and the individuals he associated with.

connections.description: Maxwell describes herself as having been with Epstein and working for him, finding people for professional jobs. She also testifies about their sexual relationship.
Berman is the U.S. Attorney to whom the deposition clips of Maxwell are being forwarded for review.

events.title: Forwarding of Maxwell Deposition Clips
events.description: A contractor forwards 11 emails containing transcript clips from a deposition or interview of Ghislaine Maxwell to U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman and others.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell testifies she is unaware of any underage females coming to Jeffrey Epstein's homes to perform massages during the times she was present.
Maxwell denies ever giving anyone a massage, including Jeffrey Epstein.
Maxwell testifies she was not aware of Jeffrey Epstein having sexual activities with anyone other than herself and two other women on a few occasions in the 1990s and 2000s.
Maxwell denies being aware of sex toys or devices used in sexual activities at any of Epstein's properties.
The questioning repeatedly focuses on Maxwell's knowledge of and role in bringing underage girls to Epstein's properties, which she consistently denies.
